bypass.description: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

color-contrast.description: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

items.html: Want to change healthcare for the better?
Our mission is to improve the health and well-being of older Americans by caring for every person like family.
• Honor diverse perspectives — challenging ourselves, each other, and the status quo
• Embrace change and keep the big picture in mind
• Approach hard conversations head-on, always assuming positive intent
• React thoughtfully and collaboratively when things go wrong
• Treat ourselves, each other, and our members with empathy and respect
This fuels our success as a company and allows us to have the greatest impact — working towards our vision of making a longer, better life possible for everyone.
Our team's made of creative, thoughtful, kind people from all backgrounds. Not just healthcare. And we're guided by 4 core values.
We strive to treat every Member like family — and that mindset applies to our teams too. Expect benefits that support your body, mind, and well-being now and later.
Our headquarters are just outside Boston in Waltham, MA, but we have teams and offices across the country.
Help change healthcare for the better.
View Open Positions
See the files for our BCBSMA employee health plans.

items.html: Want to change healthcare for the better?
Our mission is to improve the health and well-being of older Americans by caring for every person like family.
• Honor diverse perspectives — challenging ourselves, each other, and the status quo
• Embrace change and keep the big picture in mind
• Approach hard conversations head-on, always assuming positive intent
• React thoughtfully and collaboratively when things go wrong
• Treat ourselves, each other, and our members with empathy and respect
This fuels our success as a company and allows us to have the greatest impact — working towards our vision of making a longer, better life possible for everyone.
Our team's made of creative, thoughtful, kind people from all backgrounds. Not just healthcare. And we're guided by 4 core values.

Members first

Our Members are our #1 priority. Our work puts them first.

Members first

Our Members are our #1 priority. Our work puts them first.
Our Members are our #1 priority. Our work puts them first.

Resilience matters

Setbacks don't discourage us. We bounce back and keep going.

Resilience matters

Setbacks don't discourage us. We bounce back and keep going.
Setbacks don't discourage us. We bounce back and keep going.

Speed wins

We set clear goals. Get them done. Then repeat.

Speed wins

We set clear goals. Get them done. Then repeat.
We set clear goals. Get them done. Then repeat.

It takes a team

We build diverse teams and believe that we do our best work together.
We build diverse teams and believe that we do our best work together.
We strive to treat every Member like family — and that mindset applies to our teams too. Expect benefits that support your body, mind, and well-being now and later.
Our headquarters are just outside Boston in Waltham, MA, but we have teams and offices across the country.
